description:
Tap into the power of the sun and keep your BaseCharge 1500 powered up, and ready to go. This cable lets you connect up to 4 Solar 100s (not included) to your BaseCharge 1500’s HPP port.

  • High Power Pole (HPP) male port on one end and 4 HHP female ports on the other
  • Gauge: 16AWG – on the 4, into 14AWG – on the single
  • Length: 36cm (14")
name: BioLite 4x1 Solar Chaining Cable
